com.seagate.kinetic.client

Class ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • com.seagate.kinetic.client.ClientConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>

    public class ClientConfiguration
extends Properties
    Kinetic Client configuration.

    Kinetic applications construct a new instance of this instance and set appropriate configurations. Application then calls KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration) to create a new instance of KineticClient

    Author:
    James Hughes., Chiaming Yang
    See Also:
    KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration), KineticClient, Serialized Form

      • setAsyncQueueSize

        public void setAsyncQueueSize(int qsize)
        Set asynchronous operation queued size. For asynchronous operations, a request is blocked when the queued requests reached the count set for this instance. Default is set to 10.
        Parameters:
        qsize - the max queued operations to be set for the current kinetic client instance.

      • getAsyncQueueSize

        public int getAsyncQueueSize()
        Get asynchronous operation queued size. For asynchronous operations, a request is blocked when the queued requests reached the size set for this instance. Default is set to 10.
        Returns:
        the max queued operations for the current kinetic instance

      • getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout

        public long getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout()
        Get Java Nio thread pool exit await timeout - used when connection is closed and Java client runtime library waiting for thread pool to exit.
        Returns:
        time out in milli seconds.
